characters.name: Steve Rogers
characters.title: Captain America
characters.description: Recipient of the Super-Soldier serum, World War II hero Steve Rogers fights for American ideals as one of the world’s mightiest heroes and the leader of the Avengers.

characters.name: Tony Stark
characters.title: Iron Man
characters.description: Genius. Billionaire. Playboy. Philanthropist. Tony Stark's confidence is only matched by his high-flying abilities as the hero called Iron Man.

characters.name: James Rhodes
characters.title: War Machine
characters.description: Military veteran James Rhodes is ready for combat in his advanced armor, adding a formidable arsenal to Tony Stark-created designs.

characters.name: Natasha Romanoff
characters.title: Black Widow
characters.description: Military veteran James Rhodes is ready for combat in his advanced armor, adding a formidable arsenal to Tony Stark-created designs.

characters.name: Bruce Banner
characters.title: Hulk
characters.description: Dr. Bruce Banner lives a life caught between the soft-spoken scientist he’s always been and the uncontrollable green monster powered by his rage.

characters.name: Thor Odinson
characters.title: Thor
characters.description: The son of Odin uses his mighty abilities as the God of Thunder to protect his home Asgard and planet Earth alike.

characters.name: Clint Barton
characters.title: Hawkeye
characters.description: A master marksman and longtime friend of Black Widow, Clint Barton serves as the Avengers’ amazing archer..

characters.name: T'CHALLA
characters.title: Black Panther
characters.description: T’Challa is the king of the secretive and highly advanced African nation of Wakanda - as well as the powerful warrior known as the Black Panther.

characters.name: Thanos
characters.title: Black Panther
characters.description: The Mad Titan Thanos quests across the universe in search of the Infinity Stones, intending to use their limitless power for shocking purposes.

characters.name: CAROL DANVERS
characters.title: Captain Marvel
characters.description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.
